mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product (productid, price, ice_possible, explain) VALUES (#{productId}, #{price}, #{ice_possible}, #{explain})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product set price = #{price}, ice_possible = #{ice_possible}, explain = #{explain} WHERE productid = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(tbl_product idx_product) */ rownum rn, productid, price, ice_possible, explain FROM tbl_product WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
